trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a configuration error has occurred.
The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception is thrown when any error occurs while configuration information is being read or written.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> Исключение при возникновении любой ошибки, сведения о конфигурации при чтении или записи.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a custom section and generates a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception when it modifies its properties.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода создается пользовательский раздел и приводит к возникновению ошибки <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> исключение, если она изменяет его свойства.

trans-unit.source: The following example is a configuration excerpt used by the previous example.
trans-unit.target: Ниже приведен фрагмент конфигурации, используемый в предыдущем примере.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> class.
A message that describes why this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception was thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> class.
The object that holds the information to deserialize.
Contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> class.
The current type is not a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationException" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" />.
A message that describes why this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception was thrown.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> class.
A message that describes why this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception was thrown.

A message that describes why this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception was thrown.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> class.

The line number within the configuration file at which this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception was thrown.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> class.
A message that describes why this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception was thrown.

Gets a description of why this configuration exception was thrown.
A description of why this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> was thrown.
trans-unit.target: О том, почему это <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> создано исключение.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.BareMessage%2A> property does not contain the name of the configuration file or the line number at which this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.BareMessage%2A> Свойство не содержит имя файла конфигурации или номер строки этого <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> возникло исключение.

trans-unit.source: If you want a message that contains the name of the configuration file and the line number, along with the message, use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Сообщение, содержащее имя файла конфигурации и номер строки вместе с сообщением, используйте <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Message%2A> свойство.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to get the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.BareMessage%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода показано, как получить <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.BareMessage%2A> значение свойства.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of errors that detail the reasons this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception was thrown.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> object that contains errors that identify the reasons this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> , Содержащий ошибки, которые определяют причины, это <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> возникло исключение.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Errors%2A> property collects as many errors as possible that might occur during an operation, such as reading a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Errors%2A> Свойство собирает столько ошибки, насколько это возможно, что могут возникнуть во время операции, таких как чтение файла конфигурации.

trans-unit.source: The exception thrown shows only the first error.
trans-unit.target: Исключение показывает только первая ошибка.

trans-unit.source: You can access <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Errors%2A> to see all the errors issued.
trans-unit.target: Вы можете получить доступ к <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Errors%2A> для просмотра всех ошибок, выдаваемых.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the configuration file that caused this configuration exception to be thrown.
The path to the configuration file that caused this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Путь к файлу конфигурации, это вызвано <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> исключение.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to get the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Filename%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода показано, как получить <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Filename%2A> значение свойства.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the configuration file being read when this configuration exception was thrown.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object that caused this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception to be thrown.
Gets the path to the configuration file from which the internal <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.
The path to the configuration file from which the internal <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that contains the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object being parsed when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> Возвращает имя файла конфигурации, содержащий <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> объекта, который анализировался в момент возникновения исключения.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object that caused this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception to be thrown.
Gets the path to the configuration file that the internal <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> was reading when this configuration exception was thrown.
The path of the configuration file the internal <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object was accessing when the exception occurred.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was accessing when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> Возвращает имя файла конфигурации, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> объект обращался, когда произошло исключение.

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number within the configuration file that was being processed when this configuration exception was thrown.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object that caused this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception to be thrown.
Gets the line number within the configuration file that the internal <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object represented when this configuration exception was thrown.
The line number within the configuration file that contains the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> object being parsed when this configuration exception was thrown.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that contains the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object being parsed when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> Возвращает имя файла конфигурации, содержащий <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> объекта, который анализировался в момент возникновения исключения.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object that caused this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception to be thrown.
Gets the line number within the configuration file that the internal <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object was processing when this configuration exception was thrown.
The line number within the configuration file that the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object was accessing when the exception occurred.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetLineNumber%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was accessing when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetLineNumber%2A> Возвращает имя файла конфигурации, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> объект обращался, когда произошло исключение.

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the information to be serialized.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with the file name and line number at which this configuration exception occurred.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetObjectData%2A> method sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object with the file name and line number at which this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetObjectData%2A> Метода задает <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> объекта с помощью файла имя и номер строки этого <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> возникло исключение.

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object that is transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: Во время десериализации <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> исключение воссоздается из <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> объекта, переданного в потоке.

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number within the configuration file at which this configuration exception was thrown.
The line number within the configuration file at which this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Номер строки в файле конфигурации, в которой возникло данное исключение <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to get the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Line%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода показано, как получить <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Line%2A> значение свойства.

trans-unit.source: Gets an extended description of why this configuration exception was thrown.
An extended description of why this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Расширенное описание причин это <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" /> возникло исключение.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to get the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Message%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: В следующем примере кода показано, как получить <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Message%2A> значение свойства.
